name: brackets-macos-xcode-dusk
title: macOS Xcode Dusk Theme
description: The saga of macOS Xcode themes continue! After macOS Xcode default theme take a look to new Dusk theme for Brackets!
author: Diogo Filipe <diogo.filipee@hotmail.com> (https://github.com/diogofilipee)

pt.description: A saga dos temas do macOS Xcode continuam! Experimente o novo tema Dusk, uma variação do tema padrão do editor de texto macOS Xcode, adaptado para o Brackets!
